Amid plans to expand future first-year classes by as much as 20 percent, Columbia adds two new housing options: 548 W. 114th St. and 542 W. 112th St.

The housing additions are coupled with the closure of an undergraduate dorm at 503 W. 121st St., known as “The Fairholm,” and the continued closure of Hartley Hall due to renovations toundergraduate housing for 2026-27.

503 W. 121st St.

‘The Fairholm’

2026-27 Undergraduate

Housing Options

Note: “New” and “Not Available” housing options reflect changes for the 2026-27 academic year.

Amid plans to expand future first-year classes by as much as 20 percent, Columbia adds two new housing options: 548 W. 114th St. and 542 W. 112th St.

The housing additions are coupled with the closure of an undergraduate dorm at 503 W. 121st St., known as “The Fairholm,” and the continued closure of Hartley Hall due to renovations to undergraduate housing for 2026-27.
